name: 柯開維
objective:
1.電腦通訊網路簡介 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換技術 4.流量與壅塞控制 5.介質存取控制機制 6.區域網路 7.網路互連技術 8.無線網路 9.高速網路
 
The outline and schedule are subject to be changed. If it does, it will be announced in class.
schedule:
Week 1-3: Basis of Computer Communication Networks and Protocols
Evolution and Trend, Switching techniques, LAN/MAN/WAN,  CO & CL approaches, Multiplexing, Addressing, Protocol (stack) and Layering (skin view), Network Topology, Internet architecture, Request for Comments (RFCs), Standard bodies
Week 3-4: Application Layer Protocols
Protocol layer  interaction (deeper view), Services and APL  protocols’ operation* (FTP, HTTP, SMTP,   POP3, Telnet), Socket  concept  and programming examples
Week 5-6: Transport Control Protocols
User Datagram Protocol (UDP) & Transmission Control  Protocol (TCP): Header, State TX., Flow, Error and Congestion controls
Week 7-8: IPv4 related protocol and It’s Problems
Full IPv4 and related protocols (ARP/RARP, ICMP, NAT, DHCP, subnetting), Problems of IPv4 and their Solutions (VLSM, Supernetting,  CIDR), Router operation
Week 9-12: Medium Access Control and Local Area Networks (Ethernet-centric)
Minterm Exam.
Get the right-of-the-way to transfer information across the media under various topology, Multiple access mechanisms and Performance issues,LAN Technology (Ethernet, Token Ring*), Devices (hub/repeater/switch/bridge)  & operation, Design issues
Week 13-14: Data Link Control
Framing (Synchronization), Flow control, Reliable data transfer and Error recovery(ARQ)
Week 15-16: IPv6 – The next generation Internet
Three addressing schemes, protocol (Internet) operations , and various transition techniques
Week 17-18: Routing Protocols and Algorithms*
Routing for packet-switched data communication networks - Internet
Final Exam and Presentation.
*  ~ would be covered if time's available
